Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map CS_DRUGBUST


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: December 10 2013

Here is the Navigation Mesh for excellent fast-paced urban-themed map [cs_drugbust](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/20962) by malfuncti0n (released February 2007).
It's a almost completely re-maded and fully hand-tuned .nav-file (because an original author's .nav-file was simple auto-gen).

Most areas and paths were build manually 'cause during an auto-generation processing the majority of them were constructed incorrectly or incomplete. Some important pathways were broken off (in particular some ladders and ways to hidden places in T-house). Also the set of other inaccuracies was corrected.

Bots have opportunity to use all walkable ways now but... here it should be noted TWO very essential moments which spoil impression of gameplay with bots on this fine map, also change game tactics:

1 - Bots perfectly see through a fence. It does almost impossible the stealth actions. Though in process of opportunities I tried to reduce the frequency of their movements in perimeter ;-)

2 - Bots not sliky often use roofs of the neighboring houses for maintaining sniper fire. That too changes a habitual picture of gameplay.

Both of these moments can be corrected due to skillful use of radio commands by players of both teams: for CTs - "follow me" (to bring part of bots on a roof), for Ts - "hold this position" (to force part of bots to protect hostages and not to leave the house).

Also this Navigation Mesh was fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by map creator available to downloading with the [same map](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/20962).

P.S. Thanks to O.T.I.S. for a reminder about this interesting map!
